TEXT: The applicant is a NORP citizen , born in DATE in GPE . At the time of the facts , the applicant was an officer with the rank of captain .
The facts of the present case , as submitted by the applicant , may be summarised as follows .
In DATE investigations were initiated against a number of persons including the applicant , who was the ORG Commander of Çorlu , concerning various smuggling incidents in this region .
In an indictment dated DATE , ORG charged only the applicant , under LAW , with abuse of office by assisting and protecting smugglers .
On DATE ORG convicted the applicant for abuse of office and sentenced him to DATE and DATE imprisonment and to a heavy fine .

The applicant appealed . On DATE ORG quashed the judgement delivered by ORG , indicating that the classification of the offence was incorrect and that the investigation was incomplete . According to ORG , the applicant ought to have been tried for collective smuggling .

ORG joined the applicant ’s case with another case of collective smuggling initiated against CARDINAL co - accused . ORG , inter alia , took oral evidence from various witnesses , consulted experts and examined extracts from customs registries and customs service reports .

On DATE the ORG convicted the applicant and the other co - accused for collective smuggling and sentenced the applicant to DATE and DATE imprisonment . The ORG found that the applicant and the other accused had arranged the entry into GPE of a truck loaded with smuggled goods .
On DATE ORG upheld the decision of ORG . It noted that ORG had examined the charges as well as the defence , evaluated all the evidence submitted to it and delivered an impartial judgment .
On DATE ORG at ORG rejected the applicant 's petition for rectification of ORG judgment dated DATE .

On DATE the ORG admitted the applicant 's request for the reopening of the trial . Accordingly , the court initiated new proceedings . On DATE ORG convicted the applicant confirming its former decision dated DATE . ORG considered that the new elements submitted by the applicant could not have any effect on the reasoning of the judgment of CARDINAL DATE . The applicant appealed . On DATE ORG upheld the decision of ORG dated DATE .
On DATE ORG at ORG rejected the applicant 's petition for rectification of ORG decision .
On DATE ORG rejected the applicant 's second petition for the reopening of his trial .
